eviware soapUI

Working Offline?

soapUI can't access the Internet.

soapUI is unable to access the Internet. This might cause some issues when doing Web Service Testing.

If you know that you need Internet Access in order to do Web Service Testing, please check you Internet Connection.

www.soapui.org

What's new in soapUI 2.5?

soapUI 2.5, the REST Release.

soapUI 2.5 now includes market leading support for REST testing.

In the new release you get full support for REST Testing. We would like to think it's a gem! soapUI REST Testing makes it possible for you to do complete RestTests with or without a WADL.



How do I start?

New soapUI User?

Start by doing the following:

  • Read the Feature Overview
  • Read the soapUI Pro comparison
  • Try your hands on the Example soapUI Project
  • Read the Getting Started with soapUI Guide
  • Watch the Example Project Movie
